turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I'm so frustrated. I can't seem to find where to download my bank statements from last year. Can you help me?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can certainly help with that. To download your bank statements from last year, please log into your online banking portal. Once logged in, navigate to the 'Statements' or 'Documents' section. You should be able to filter by year and select the specific statements you need. Let me know if you still have trouble finding it.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I found the statements section, but it only shows the last 6 months. I need January through December of last year. What's the deal? And why is this so difficult?!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the inconvenience. Some banks only provide a limited window of online access to statements. To access older statements, you may need to request them specifically. You can do this through our online form located under 'Customer Support' -> 'Statement Request', or by calling our customer service line. Is there anything else I can help with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: So, if I request them, what kind of security measures do you have in place to ensure that my statements aren't sent to the wrong person? I'm a little worried about identity theft these days.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a very valid concern. When you request statements, either online or via phone, we verify your identity using several factors, including your account number, social security number, and date of birth. For online requests, the statements are delivered securely to your online banking portal, which requires multi-factor authentication. If you request paper statements via mail, they are sent to the address we have on file for your account. You can also opt to pick them up at a branch and will need to show identification. We employ encryption and other security protocols to protect your data during transmission and storage.
